article_text:
Beckley, WV (25801)

Today

Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 82F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Tina Alvey REGISTER-HERALD REPORTER

og.description: Rainelle Medical Center is among six West Virginia health centers that will receive federal funding for facility renovation, expansion or construction this fiscal year.
og.title: Rainelle Medical Center receives funding
